item.description:
In conjunction with the Boston Law of Attraction Meetup I will be presenting a workshop on how ho'oponopono works for the Law of Attraction.  (The $5 fee will be paid to the Boston LOA meetup.)

Clearing the Path to Attract What You Want

Jack Canfield & Joe Vitale, Master Teachers featured in The Secret, use this process everyday, every time they face experiences that are unattractive & undesirable. It’s Ho’oponopono….easy to learn, easy to use.

 
Ho'o...what? 

Ho'oponopono… it means "to make right". It is an ancient Hawaiian practice of reconciliation, forgiveness & ultimately, it heals.
 
Do you have relationships…with family, friends, colleague, lover, partner… that have gone off kilter? Are you left with regrets, with sadness, wondering whether you can attract desirable, sustainable, trusting relationships again?
 
You’ll learn
- how Ho'oponopono is validated by the concepts of quantum physics & Law Of Attraction
- how to clear & release any mental & emotional blocks and
- how to keep yourself "centered” in forgiveness, gratitude & love more easily, attracting the relationships your heart desires.

Kevin will take the concepts of ho’oponopono, as taught by Dr. He Len (via Joe Vitale) and explain how it is validated by the concepts of quantum physics and show you how it will work your life.

Note: For folk who know about 4 phrase Ho'oponopono process, this is much, much more…

******************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

******************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

 Kevin Martin is an author (Perceive This!), speaker, certified hypnotherapist, master practitioner of NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming), and personal development specialist. He has been helping people “help themselves” for many years with his skills in hypnosis, NLP, as well as various other mind-body modalities.  His NLP/Hypnosis instructor and mentor was personally trained by Morna Semeona, the same person who trained Dr. Hew Len.  Kevin has had various instruction in Ho’oponopono and several other Huna techniques.  He brings his passion and knowledge to the subject.

Kevin just finished developing and presenting a ground breaking seminar with Boston’s own quantum physics researcher – Barry Harris.  Information about this program can be found at: Breaking Through the Illusions

You can learn about Ho’oponopono, hypnosis and much more at Kevin’s website – www.poseffects.com
item.how_to_find_us: Talk to Kevin or Chew for directions and information

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Clearing the Path to Attract What You Want - Boston
